thread.title: Abercrombie Brings In Outsiders in Management Revamp
thread.title_full: Abercrombie Brings In Outsiders in Management Revamp - WSJ

author: Suzanne Kapner
title: Abercrombie Brings In Outsiders in Management Revamp
text:
Abercrombie & Fitch Inc. is restructuring the management of its Abercrombie brand, as it seeks to turn around the ailing chain.
The company plans to announce on Tuesday that it is creating six new positions, part of a strategy to organize executives by brand, rather than product. All but one of the new positions will be filled by recently hired outsiders. The executives will report to Christos Angelides, Abercrombieâ€™s brand...
